item.title: Don't Forget to Download Your App Inventor Projects - Shutdown on Dec 31st
item.description:
#“Don’t Forget to Download Your App Inventor Projects - Shutdown on Dec 31st”

If you ever did anything on GoogleApp Inventor, you have 9 days to download your code.

I had to log in 30 times to download all the projects of the kids in our school (30 teams of 2). Next step is to setup a private instance of App Inventor on App Engine and EC2 in lieu of MIT being ready.
